body.name: WISELIFE Storage Basket Large Cotton Rope Basket 21.7"x 21.7" x 13.8" Baby Laundry Basket with Handle Big Basket Soft Nursery Cube Bin Durable Laundry Hamper for Living Room(Gradient Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 42 mins
features: Soft and durable material:The Storage Basket is made of premium cotton and is soft with no rough edges. Suitable for a nursery, living room, bedroom, or laundry room.

Cotton woven thread rope: Woven basket is soft yet sturdy enough to maintain its shape. Handles are reinforced with durable tight stitching to prevent tearing. The basket can be folded to save space when not in use.
Large size: Four sizes to choose from to meet every storage need. Suitable for storing blankets, clothes, toys, books, laundry.
Washable: Hand Wash is recommended. Machine washing may cause product deformation. Tip: Put it into a laundry bag if using washing machine. Allow to air dry.

Notes: The blanket basket comes in folded from shipping. Filling the laundry basket up with blankets or clothes will return the basket to its correct shape. Smooth shipping creases by ironing it inside out.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutral color design The basket is designed with white and grey colors that match any home decor. Perfect for baby shower or new home gift. Durability handles design Woven basket is soft yet sturdy enough to maintain its shape. Handles are reinforced with durable tight stitching to prevent tearing. Large size Four sizes to choose from to meet every storage need. Suitable for storing blankets, clothes, toys, books, laundry. Soft and durable material The Storage Basket is made of premium cotton and is soft with no rough edges. Suitable for a nursery, living room, bedroom, or laundry room. Neutral color Durability handle Large size Premium cotton
Versatility This large Storage Basket can hold blankets, clothes, toys, and more. Keep in the living room, playroom, bedroom, or any room in the house that could use extra storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice rope style basket. Sturdy and stylish. Great size, with plenty of room for dirty clothes, toys, towels, blankets or whatever you decide to use it for. The handles are equally sturdy and add to the convenience. The only drawback is that it would be a plus to have a reinforced bottom. However, as is, does allow it to be folded neatly and put away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for throw blankets
reviews.reviewText: My wife had a massive corner pile of throw blankets this works perfectly for organizing those as well as throw pillows. It's huge as pictured, extremely durable, and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect toy room addition
reviews.reviewText: This basket was purchased to hold stuffed animals.It. Is. Perfect!The size is great; not being too big for the space, but holding all the toys. Easy cleanup as well, as the kids can just toss the toys in the basket when done. It looks nice, and can still be "played with" because it's washable!!Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large and durable
reviews.reviewText: I love this basket because of the value and size, it's hard to find decent rope baskets for a good price. The colors are muted so it is versatile and can go into any theme designed space. I do want to say the structural support is not there, the edges at the top fold in. If you're filling with toys it is great, if you're filling with pillows and throws it will also be great, but don't expect for the corner of your throw blanket to hang over the top edge and not fold the basket down. The handles are my favorite part because they're incredibly thick and sturdy and even with a lot of weight in the basket, they won't break.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my use case, but it only seems to hold its shape when full.
reviews.reviewText: It's huge. I have 3 pretty thick blankets in mine, and it holds them well. It looks very good. One caveat, however, is that I think if I did not have mine stuffed full, it probably would not hold its shape well at all. I think that if you want something out in the open that won't always be full, and you want something that holds its shape extremely well, you likely could find better options. However, in my case I just wanted something that held my blankets at the end of the couch out of the way, and this works very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This basket is amazing! XL but light weight - easy to carry. Holds a lot. I absolutely love these. I have one in each bedroom we use for laundry and one in living room for blankets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy but not shaped well
reviews.reviewText: It’s large and durable, but as far as holding a circular shape, not so much. Serves its purpose but I’ve had better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! A solution for blanket clutter.
reviews.reviewText: This rope basket is the solution I've been looking for to contain the blanket clutter near my favorite chair. I like to check email, read, er... fall asleep,,, in my favorite chair with a blanket - or two depending on the weather. The blankets always looked like clutter when I wasn't using them because they didn't have a home. This basket holds two extra fluffy, large throw size blankets with some room to spare. I put an extra phone charger in the bottom of the basket for the rare times I charge my phone while sitting there.The color is just what I expected from the listing and complements the space really well. The listing mentions that the basket comes folded and needs time to hold its shape. It is standing up fine with the blankets in it and I hope that the loose folds in the sides will relax in a few days.I can see this being used for throw blankets, stuffed animals, throw pillows, etc. Just what I was looking for, and the price was right, too. Recommended if the loose folds won't make you crazy.
